name: Keep It Alive (Averona)
description:
Traditions come and go with the ebbing of time. Hana has seen this first hand - her beloved art of dance, once core to the beliefs of her town, has all but been abandoned.

Will she be able to keep it alive?

A project made for Ludum Dare 46 - theme of "Keep It Alive". All things considered, this project was constructed in about 10-12 hours over the course of the weekend. I hope that you can enjoy this project!

Credits:

Story, Programming - Averona ( https://twitter.com/AveronaVN )

Title, Character, CG - MilkTea ( https://twitter.com/Milktea_0021 )
